subject: Bad credit ok
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this tender will expire THIS NIGHT):
$286,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!!
http://duplexiformrx.com/
